wordGroup: anglo american 英美资源集团

sentences.en: He was born of Anglo-American parentage.
The difference is, you are Anglo-Saxons, we are Latins.
sentences.cn: 区别在于，你们是盎格鲁撒克逊民族，我们是拉丁民族。

sentences.en: "The difference is," he said portentously, "you are Anglo-Saxons, we are Latins."
sentences.cn: 他拿腔拿调地说道：“区别在于，你们是盎格鲁-撒克逊人，我们是拉丁人。”
